title: Making Hash Browns
alt: There are at least fourteen ways this could go badly (seventeen if that fork is a dangerous crossbreed.)
transcript: [Cueball stands holding a flaming tennis racket. He is throwing a potato in the air as if to serve like a tennis ball. Behind him is a red gas can and a sack of potatoes. Across from him is another person holding a fork in one hand and balancing a serving tray with a glass holding an orange liquid in it.]
